alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Issaquena; Madison; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:00AM CDT until April 01 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Hinds County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Vicksburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Redwood around 210 AM CDT. Oak Ridge and Flowers around 220 AM CDT. Youngton around 225 AM CDT. Phoenix around 230 AM CDT. Brownsville around 235 AM CDT. Flora and Pocahontas around 250 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bentonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and central and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
